plugins.rationale_activity_recognition: We need access to activity data to track your steps and fitness.
plugins.rationale_steps_read: Read access to show your daily step count.
plugins.rationale_steps_write: Write access to sync your step data.
plugins.rationale_weight_read: Read access to show your weight history.
plugins.rationale_body_fat_read: Read access to show body composition.
plugins.rationale_active_calories_burned_read: Read access to show calories burned.
plugins.rationale_total_calories_burned_read: Read access to show total energy expenditure.
plugins.rationale_distance_read: Read access to show distance covered.
plugins.rationale_heart_rate_read: Read access to show heart rate data.
plugins.rationale_sleep_session_read: Read access to show sleep duration.
plugins.rationale_hydration_read: Read access to show water intake.
plugins.rationale_nutrition_read: Read access to show nutrition data.
